仙人跳.definition: confidence trick in which a man is lured by an attractive woman

仙八色鶇.definition: (bird species of China) fairy pitta (Pitta nympha)

仙去.definition: to become an immortal; (fig.) to die

仙女座大星雲.pinyin: Xian1 nu:3 zuo4 da4 xing1 yun2
仙女座大星雲.definition: great nebula in Andromeda or Andromeda galaxy M31

仙姿玉色.definition: heavenly beauty, jewel colors (idiom); unusually beautiful lady

仙宮.definition: underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology

仙居.definition: Xianju county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

仙居縣.definition: Xianju county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

仙山瓊閣.definition: jeweled palace in the fairy mountain

仙方.definition: prescription of elixir; potion of immortality; potion prescribed by an immortal

仙方兒.definition: erhua variant of 仙方[xian1 fang1]

仙桃.definition: the peaches of immortality of Goddess Xi Wangmu 西王母

仙桃市.definition: Xiantao sub-prefecture level city in Hubei

仙氣.definition: ethereal quality; (Chinese folklore) a puff of breath from the mouth of a celestial being, which can magically transform an object into sth else

仙界.definition: world of the immortals; a fairyland; a paradise

仙臺.definition: Sendai, capital of Miyagi prefecture 宮城縣|宫城县[Gong1 cheng2 xian4] in northeast Japan

仙茅.definition: golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides); Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)

仙藥.definition: legendary magic potion of immortals; panacea; fig. wonder solution to a problem

仙逝.definition: to die; to depart this mortal coil

仙遊.definition: Xianyou, a county in Putian City 莆田市[Pu2tian2 Shi4], Fujian

仙遊縣.definition: Xianyou, a county in Putian City 莆田市[Pu2tian2 Shi4], Fujian
